reporting-org.narrative: The William and Flora Hewlett Foundation

title.narrative: "for research on enhancing energy security through energy efficiency and renewable energy in India"

description.narrative: "This is an Expenditure Responsibility (ER) grant to the Indian NGO PRAYAS. This grant will fund three activities. First, it will support PRAYAS in their efforts to develop a new policy framework for distributed photovoltaic (PV) systems, focusing on agricultural policies to combine super-efficient water pumps with solar power. Second, it will facilitate the adoption of super-efficient technology in newly electrified low- and medium-income households through policy that seeks to rationalize Indian subsidies to more directly promote the interests of this population. Finally, the grant will fund efforts to promote regulatory reforms that will lead to more sustainable models of the electricity distribution."
